thread.title: Beating Bearcats a bugaboo for Huskies
thread.title_full: Beating Bearcats a bugaboo for Huskies

author: ED DAIGNEAULT REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN
title: Beating Bearcats a bugaboo for Huskies
text:
Friday, October 23, 2015 11:59 PM EDT 
Beating Bearcats a bugaboo for Huskies BY ED DAIGNEAULT REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN Connecticut cornerback John Green, bottom, breaks up a pass intended for Central Florida wide receiver D'erren Wilson (82) during the second half of an NCAA college football game, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015, in Orlando, Fla. Connecticut won 40-13. (AP Photo/John Raoux) Browse for Republican American Reprints The UConn football team has indeed made progress even if the results don't bear that out completely. The ultimate measure of how many forward strides have been taken might come today.The Huskies take on Cincinnati this afternoon at Nippert Stadium, where they have never won and — with one exception — have never come close to winning in six attempts. If there is a team that UConn can't seem to figure out, it is the Bearcats. Read more of this story and more! 7-Day Subscribers have FREE access to everything on rep-am.com and our E-Edition.
